meanings.definition: A type of Jewish sausage made from beef or chicken fat and flour.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother makes delicious kishke for our family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The kishke was the highlight of the holiday feast.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the kishke for a regular sausage and surprised everyone!
meanings.sent4: The kishke, with its blend of flavors, is a true culinary delight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the simmering kishke filled the kitchen with warmth and comfort.

meanings.sent1: The kishke casing added a unique texture to the dish.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to tear the delicate kishke casing while cooking.
meanings.sent3: I playfully pretended the kishke casing was a telescope and amused my friends.
meanings.sent4: The kishke casing, like a protective shield, kept the flavors intact.
meanings.sent5: The shiny kishke casing glistened under the kitchen lights.
